column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We're from New England so we love our thin crust pizza. Did not have high expectations for deep dish.....it was fantastic. The light buttery crust
column2: sauce not overloaded with spices but featuring a great fresh tomato taste. My husband fully expected to not really like it
column3: he said it was great and he'd come back again and so would I!! Takes awhile to get the pizza but worth the wait. GO
